articles.title: How AI-powered Samsung technology is creating homes that are wonder-filled
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing new AI-powered home appliances and audio-visual solutions, including the 809L Bespoke AI Family Hub™+ Refrigerator with a 32-inch screen, the 615L AI Home Side By Side Refrigerator with a 9-inch screen, Neo QLED 8K QN990F, Neo QLED 4K TV, HW-Q990F and HW-QS700F soundbars, and Bespoke Jet Bot Combo™ AI. These products aim to provide convenience, security, and an interconnected smart home experience for users by automating household tasks and offering advanced features like smart home control, personalized information, and immersive audio-visual experiences.

articles.title: How AI-powered Samsung technology is creating homes that are wonder-filled
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its 2025 line-up of AI-powered home appliances and audio-visual solutions. The new products include the 809L Bespoke AI Family Hub™+ Refrigerator featuring a 32-inch display, the 615L AI Home Side By Side Refrigerator with a 9-inch AI Home screen, Neo QLED 8K QN990F and Neo QLED 4K TV that adapt their brightness and sound, and Q-Series soundbars that use AI-optimized sound.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A: How to preorder and get free gifts? See release date, platforms, setting, game cover, and Pokémon Presents date and where to watch
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company International announced that Pokémon Legends: Z-A will be released on October 16, 2025, for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. Preorders for the game begin on June 5 through the Nintendo eShop. A Pokémon Presents video presentation is scheduled for July 22, and preorders from the Pokémon Center in the US, Canada, or the UK will receive a free plush.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers snap up Baileys dupe for a third of the price with new flavours launched just in time for summer
articles.author: Karim Camara
articles.summary: Aldi is launching three new dessert-inspired Ballycastle Country Cream flavors: Birthday Cake, Strawberries & Cream, and Cookie Dough Ice Cream. The Birthday Cake flavor is available now, while the Strawberries & Cream will be available June 9, and the Cookie Dough Ice Cream on June 26. These Ballycastle dupes are priced at £7.49, significantly cheaper than Baileys.

articles.title: How image search is transforming omnichannel shopping
articles.author: Saurabh Agrawal
articles.summary: Google Lens, Amazon, Myntra, and Meesho have implemented image search features allowing users to find products by uploading photos. These platforms enable users to discover similar fashion items and exact matches using images, which helps users discover, compare, and choose products in just a few seconds. Brands are advised to optimize their product catalogs and product images to ensure they are easily found via image search.

articles.title: The Ouai Leave-In Conditioner Is on Sale for PEOPLE Readers
articles.author: Alyssa Grabinski
articles.summary: Ouai's Leave-In Conditioner & Heat Protectant Spray, created by celebrity hairstylist Jen Atkin, is currently on sale with code ouaipeople15. The spray is designed to detangle, hydrate, and tame frizz, containing ingredients like tamarind seed extract and vitamin E, leaving hair silky soft. The product has garnered positive reviews for its effectiveness on frizzy and unmanageable hair.

articles.title: Cox Mobile to Offer New Motorola Razr
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Cox Mobile is offering the new Motorola Razr, which features an iconic and durable design. This indicates a product launch or introduction of the new Motorola Razr by Cox Mobile.

articles.title: Amazon Has A "Gift Shop" Section Of Things You'll Want
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f. has introduced the Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, a lip gloss inspired by Summer Fridays, Rhode, and Laneige. Oxo launched the compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer, which makes cold brew in five minutes. JBL released the waterproof, super lightweight JBL Go 3 speaker. Pavoi offers dainty gold-plated birthstone necklace. The Magic Puzzle series added "The Peckish Pirates", a whimsical puzzle game.

articles.title: Entrepreneur blends her passions for scent and skincare in Hawaii Island soap shop
articles.author: Christina O'Connor
articles.summary: Paper Crane Soaps is a company likely promoting its soap products.

articles.title: Wet Hydration Rolls Out Packaging Refresh to Support Expanding Market Presence
articles.author: Wet Hydration
articles.summary: Wet Hydration introduces refreshed packaging for its functional beverage line, marking a significant step in national growth and brand evolution. The updated design features "Wellness Water" branding, vibrant fruit imagery, and enhanced functional callouts, emphasizing the zero-sugar, zero-calorie, bubble-free benefits of each flavor.

articles.title: Save 35% off this buzzed-about Nespresso Vertuo Espresso Maker today on Amazon
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: De'Longhi's Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker is being offered at a 35% discount on Amazon. The coffee maker utilizes Centrifusion extraction and barcode-based automatic blend recognition and is compatible with five cup sizes.

articles.title: Best cotton bed sheets that feel like sleeping on a cloud, per our reviews
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: The article features Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Sheet Set made from 100% organic cotton with a split King option. Brooklinen Luxe Sateen Core Sheet Set is another product made from 100% long-staple cotton. Finally, Ralph Lauren has also launched Ralph Lauren Organic Cotton Sateen Sheeting made from 624-thread count.

articles.title: Switch 2 Is Shaping Up To Be The Port Machine The Original Never Was
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 console on June 5 for $450. The new console will feature upgraded ports of games like Cyberpunk 2077, Street Fighter 6, Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess, and Split Fiction as well as replacing or upgrading older Switch ports, including Civilization 7, Fortnite, Hogwarts Legacy, and Hitman: World of Assassination. There are also ports that are coming after launch, like Star Wars Outlaws in September.

articles.title: How to use Jumia Delivery for all your shipments
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Jumia is introducing Jumia Delivery, a new independent logistics service. This service aims to simplify shipping for various users, including vendors, small businesses, and individuals, regardless of whether the items are purchased on Jumia.com.

articles.title: 2026 KGM Actyon price and specs: Korean brand adds third mid-size SUV
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: KGM is launching the Actyon, its first new model in Australia, under the brand formerly known as SsangYong. This represents the introduction of a new product in the Australian market by KGM.

articles.title: These 8 mattresses prove $1,000 is all you need for amazing rest
articles.author: James Brains
articles.summary: Several mattress companies offer new mattresses under $1000, including Nectar Classic, DreamCloud Premier Hybrid, Allswell, Bear Original, Silk & Snow Hybrid, Helix Midnight, Awara Natural Luxury Hybrid, and Titan Plus. These mattresses vary in construction (foam, hybrid, latex), firmness, cooling properties, and target sleepers (side, back, stomach, couples). Companies like Nectar, DreamCloud, and Awara offer 365-night trials and lifetime warranties.

articles.title: UGG is dropping a micro boot, and this mini classic is the new ‘it' style of the year — here's when you can get it
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG will release the new UGG Classic Micro Boot on May 30th, with early access for UGG Rewards members. The boot, available in Black, Sand, and Chestnut, features UGGplush lining, a suede outer, and an EVA outsole. It's expected to be a popular item and sell out quickly.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends Z-A Release Date, Preorder Details and More
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch Pokémon Legends: Z-A on October 16, 2025, for Nintendo Switch and the new Nintendo Switch 2.  The game features a revamped Lumiose City and new gameplay mechanics. Preorders for the digital version begin June 5, with physical preorders starting on July 23.  Pokémon Center locations have already launched Mega Evolution-themed merchandise.

articles.title: BASF Egypt launches commercial operations of Nunhems vegetable seed varieties
articles.summary: BASF Egypt has launched commercial operations for its Nunhems vegetable seed varieties in Egypt. This launch signifies BASF's commitment to providing Egyptian farmers with innovative solutions and expanding its regional presence. The event was held at the Pyramids of Giza.

articles.title: Next shoppers 'get ironing done in less time' using 'excellent' £36 cordless steamer
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Beldray has introduced the rose gold 2-in-1 cordless steam iron priced at £36, offering cordless and continuous steaming options. The iron heats up in 25 seconds, recharges in 5 seconds, and has variable temperature settings, featuring a ceramic soleplate, and is available at Next. Similar products, like the Dunelm clothes steamer and Argos Steamworks steamer, exist, but Next's option has a unique cordless design.

articles.title: Ontario artist The Weeknd and Nespresso just launched exclusive coffee collection that pays tribute to his Scarborough roots
articles.author: Itai Buenahora
articles.summary: Nespresso launched a new collection that is now available online and at Nespresso boutiques across Canada. This collection appears to be in collaboration with The Weeknd.

articles.title: Last chance deal: Save $50 on Ninja CREAMi Deluxe 11-in-1 and Waffle Maker bundle - now $280
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Ninja is offering a bundle deal on the Ninja CREAMi Deluxe 11-in-1 Frozen Treat Maker & Waffle Maker, discounted to $279.98 until June 1st. The Ninja CREAMi Deluxe features five new settings (Italian ice, Slushi, Creamiccino™, frozen yogurt, and frozen drinks) and includes the Ninja Belgian Waffle Maker PRO Neverstick™.

articles.title: How to Install SteamOS on Your Windows Gaming Handheld
articles.author: Eric Ravenscraft
articles.summary: Valve has released official instructions for installing SteamOS on devices other than the Steam Deck. The Lenovo Legion Go S is the only handheld currently with the "Powered by SteamOS" branding and official support. SteamOS can be installed on other devices like the Legion Go and ROG Ally, but support is not final.

articles.title: Boll & Branch opens its first Alabama location at The Summit
articles.author: Makenzi Fultz
articles.summary: Boll & Branch, a luxury bedding and home company, is launching its 12th brick-and-mortar location at The Summit this June. The grand opening will commence with a private party on Saturday, June 7, followed by a public opening. The new store will be located near Urban Outfitters.

articles.title: LG ELECTRONICS REIMAGINES LAUNDRY DAY FOR THE MODERN COUPLE WITH LAUNDERETTE OF LOVE EVENT IN NYC
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics USA launched the 'Love to Laundry' campaign, highlighting the emotional connection people have with their laundry appliances. As part of the campaign, LG is promoting its WashTower™ and WashCombo™ laundry solutions, emphasizing features like space-saving design, AI-driven fabric care, and energy-efficient drying for modern couples. The campaign and product promotion aim to transform laundry from a chore into a moment of connection.

articles.title: Forget Nintendo Direct, a new Pokemon Presents conference is coming soon(ish)
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company will hold a Pokemon Presents conference on July 22nd. The conference will feature announcements and gameplay trailers for new and existing Pokemon games, including Pokemon Legends Z-A, Pokemon Go, and Pokemon TCG Pocket.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A release date announced — Mega evolution merch, preorders, and Pokémon presents details revealed
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company International will launch Pokémon Legends: Z-A and Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition on October 16, 2025, with preorders starting June 5. Pokémon Center also launched a new line of Mega Evolution–themed merchandise to celebrate the upcoming game, while those who preorder the game from Pokémon Center in the U.S., Canada, or U.K. will receive a free random Sitting Cuties plush.

articles.title: Walmart's Bestselling $100 Camping Cot Is Now $55, and Shoppers Say It's ‘Surprisingly Comfortable' and ‘Sturdy'
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the GVDV Folding Camping Cot on sale for $55, which is a 45% discount. The cot features a folding steel frame and a removable padded cushion made from double-layer 1200D Oxford fabric, with pockets for storage.

articles.title: GroupM is now WPP Media; Mindshare, Wavemaker, EssenceMediacom to continue
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: WPP has rebranded its media investment arm, GroupM, as WPP Media, signaling a strategic shift towards an AI-powered, fully integrated marketing service. This new offering is linked to WPP Open, an AI-enabled marketing system, and aims to deliver personalized media, creative, data, commerce, and production services at scale.

articles.title: Refresh your Beauty Routine this Summer at Kroger
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Kroger is promoting a summer 'glow up' beauty routine featuring new products and customer favorites. This includes the launch of Kroger-branded products like Foaming Face Wash, Hydrating Facial Moisture Water Gel, Gimme Some Glow Sunscreen Lotion, Sunscreen Spray SPF 30, and Refreshing Setting Mist Sunscreen SPF 40, along with dupes of popular brands, all offered at affordable prices.

articles.title: LG Swing: il monitor 32" 4K touch che si muove con te
articles.author: Autore Fabrizio Ferrara
articles.summary: LG launched the LG Swing, a new 32-inch 4K touch monitor featuring webOS. The monitor's design allows for orientation, tilting, and easy portability, targeting both entertainment and productivity uses.

articles.title: AI Isn't the Strategy—It's Just the Tool
articles.author: Mike Hilts
articles.summary: Stirista is helping clients understand their customer segments by using AI as a tool. Mike Hilts oversees Stirista's product innovation and development, ensuring the company's offerings remain at the forefront of the industry. Stirista focuses on building a smarter marketing ecosystem where AI is a valuable tool within a broader strategy guided by data integrity and human insight.

articles.title: Dynamic Concept expands with a new operations hub in Nashville, Tennessee
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Dynamic Concept launched Dynamic Concept USA in Nashville. This new operations unit aims to better serve Dynamic Concept's American clients.

articles.title: 4 apps I use to bring widgets to my Windows 11 desktop
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Widget Launcher allows users to place interactive widgets directly onto the PC's desktop and offers customization options. BeWidgets is a widgets application that allows users to place customizable applets directly onto their PC's main desktop environment, and it comes with widgets for time, date, photos, and weather. Live Tiles Anywhere brings back dynamically updating Live Tiles, and Rainmeter is a customization tool that lets users skin their Windows 11 desktop with adjustable widget-like applets.

articles.title: Dyson's newest Supersonic Hair Dryer is on sale for 51% off at Nordstrom Rack
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Dyson's Supersonic Hair Dryer is available at Nordstrom Rack with a 51% discount, priced at $210, reduced from its original price of $420. The hair dryer is engineered with intelligent heat control, magnetic attachments, and fast-drying capabilities, all while ensuring lightweight and balanced design.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A arrives October 16
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: An enhanced version of a game will be available when Nintendo Switch 2 launches. This indicates a new product or service will accompany the new Nintendo console.

articles.title: Naturium's Revealer Sulfur Body Wash Doubles As A Facial Cleanser
articles.summary: Naturium launched the Revealer Sulfur Body Wash on May 30th, designed for skin needing TLC. This multi-tasking formula, gentle enough for the face, is powered by 2% colloidal sulfur and addresses concerns like clearing out pores. It calms irritation while helping reduce spots and redness without over-drying.

articles.title: Brother DCP-T780DW review: A competitive ink tank printer for home and micro business users
articles.author: Simon Handby
articles.summary: Brother has launched the DCP-T780DW, a refillable inkjet multifunction printer (MFP) featuring ink bottles with a high page yield, and the entry-level DCP-T580DW. The DCP-T780DW includes print, scan, and copy functions, wireless connectivity, and a 250-sheet paper cassette, offering a compact design suitable for medium desks.

articles.title: The Roborock vacuum robot with a mechanical arm is super cool. I'm certain it's the future, just not yet
articles.author: Tyler Hayes
articles.summary: Roborock has released the Saros Z70 robot vacuum and mop, which features an OmniGrip mechanical arm for moving small objects. The Roborock Z70 also has strong vacuuming and mopping capabilities with features like adaptive AI cleaning schedules and remote video call patrol functionality. Roborock also released the Saros 10R and 10 models featuring powerful suction, thorough scrubbing, a FlexiArm side brush and an extending mop pad.

articles.title: A new era begins: Wolt is now live in 34 Romanian cities
articles.author: Simona Hrincescu
articles.summary: Wolt launched its local commerce platform in 34 cities across Romania, transitioning from Tazz. The platform offers Romanian customers a broader selection of restaurants, supermarkets, and specialty stores, alongside an enhanced app experience, Wolt+ benefits, and fast deliveries. Wolt also provides merchants with new growth opportunities and courier partners with enhanced support features.

articles.title: Sephora face wash that 'stops breakouts' of spots with 2,600 five star reviews
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Fresh launched the Soy Face Cleanser in 1990, and it's now available at Sephora and Boots with a 25% discount. The cleanser contains soy proteins, cucumber extract, and rosewater, and it removes dirt, makeup, and mascara without stripping the skin, deeply cleansing pores.

articles.title: A Dyson Vacuum For Under $230? This Walmart Deal Is Hard To Believe
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Dyson V7 cordless vacuum cleaner for $230, a significant price reduction from its usual $399.99. The Dyson V7 is a lightweight, cordless stick vacuum with up to 40 minutes of battery life and two attachments, suitable for both carpet and hard floors.

articles.title: Switch 2 Startup And Menu Settings Appear Online As Early Player Shows Off Console In ...
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2 console is set to launch on June 5th. Early hands-on footage of the console has already surfaced online prior to the official launch date.

articles.title: Anthropic joins Google and OpenAI in launching voice mode for its chatbot: Here's what it can do
articles.summary: Anthropic is rolling out a dedicated voice mode for its AI chatbot, Claude, in beta on mobile. The voice mode enables users to speak to Claude for performing various tasks, including scheduling and fetching information from Google Workspace, with limitations for free users compared to paid users.

articles.title: McDonald's launches a new version of its iconic Snack Wrap! We'll tell you what it's like
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched the Crispy Mac 'N Cheesy Wrap in Singapore, featuring a mac and cheese patty, scrambled eggs, cheese, and a choice of chicken, ham, or sausage in a warm tortilla. The company also teased the return of the Snack Wrap, a menu item launched in 2006, made with chicken, lettuce, cheese, and ranch dressing wrapped in a flour tortilla, with a cryptic message suggesting it might be available before October 14, 2025.

articles.title: Nintendo's new era: looking back at the Switch and ahead to the next generation
articles.author: Verge Staff
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 console on June 5th. This new console follows the success of the Nintendo Switch, which sold over 150 million units, and aims to continue Nintendo's expansion as an entertainment company.

articles.title: Creatify Crosses $9M ARR, Raises $15.5M Series A to Launch the First End-to-End AI Ad Agent for Video
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Creatify launched AdMax, an AI ad agent combining creative inspiration, production, testing, and performance analytics. AdMax features include AI-powered video generation, AI-generated avatars, and a creative testing engine. Zumper is now producing over 300 videos monthly with Creatify, saving $20,000 per month, while NewsBreak advertisers are launching tailored creatives in minutes.

articles.title: Tech Bite With Atul Vivek, CBO, Alcatel
articles.author: Deep Majumdar
articles.summary: Alcatel has launched its V3 Series smartphones (V3 Ultra, V3 Pro, and V3 Classic) in India, introducing TCL's patented NXTPAPER display technology. The new V3 Series aims to offer enhanced user experience and improved eye comfort for the Indian consumers, marking a new advancement in mobile technology sector.

articles.title: KAM Calls for Consideration of Power Purchase Agreement Ban to Avert Power Blackout
articles.summary: A company launched the New Enhanced Flooded Battery (EFB), which is built for the demands of modern mobility.

articles.title: Aldi's 'naughty' new offering outside McDonald's has fast food fans in stitches
articles.author: Alice Giddings
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a food truck that will be giving away free Oakhurst Breakfast Hash Browns outside select McDonald's locations, starting in London on May 29th. The supermarket claims its hash browns outperform McDonald's in taste tests and aims to provide an alternative breakfast option, directly competing with the fast-food chain. Aldi sells a bag of 10 hash browns for £1.99.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A and Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Have a Release Date, Pokémon Presents Set for July
articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company announced the release date of 'Pokémon Legends: Z-A' and 'Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition' for October 16, 2025, with preorders starting June 5. Players can upgrade to the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition for improved graphics and framerates via a $10 upgrade pack from the Nintendo eShop or My Nintendo Store. Additionally, new Mega Evolution merchandise is now available on the Pokémon Center.

articles.title: Opera announces Opera Neon AI agentic browser
articles.summary: Opera has announced the launch of Opera Neon, a new AI agentic web browser. Opera Neon is designed to understand users' intent, perform tasks, and bring ideas to life on the web via a fully integrated AI agent. Users can chat, search the web, get reliable answers, and access contextual information within the browser.

articles.title: Sam Altman said AI would replace 95% of ad agency work. 3 top creative directors say AI has won them lucrative business.
articles.summary: BETC used AI to relaunch Woolite in France by creating a new brand character, the Fluffy GOAT, delivering the campaign in six weeks. BBDO used AI tools like Midjourney to convince clients to invest in ambitious concepts, creating realistic voiceovers and visualizing ideas. TBWA also recently devised an idea for a campaign that would deliver close to 1 million personalized variations of an ad to target individual customers.

articles.title: Naturium's Revealer Sulfur Body Wash Doubles As A Face Cleanser
articles.author: Daisy Maldonado
articles.summary: Naturium has launched the Revealer Sulfur Body Wash, a multi-tasking formula that functions as both a body wash and facial cleanser. The product contains a 2% colloidal sulfur complex, fermented willow bark, and aloe leaf juice, designed to clarify, exfoliate, and hydrate the skin while addressing concerns like bacne and keratosis pilaris.

articles.title: Alcatel Aims To Be In Top 3, Says CBO Atul Vivek As V3 Series Debuts In India
articles.author: Deep Majumdar
articles.summary: Alcatel launched its V3 Series smartphones in India, featuring the V3 Ultra, V3 Pro, and V3 Classic. The V3 Ultra, the flagship device, has a 6.8-inch NXTPAPER display, precision stylus, 'UltraPixel' triple-camera system, and eSIM functionality, priced at Rs 19,999.  The series will be available on Flipkart starting June 2, 2025.

articles.title: Best Hand Creams For Women On Myntra: Your Cue To Say Goodbye To Dry Skin
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works introduces a hand cream with a merlot scent, formulated with shea butter and Vitamin E for lasting moisturization. The Body Shop offers a rose-scented hand cream made with Aloe Vera and English rose extract, promising up to 48 hours of moisturization. Plum features a caramel popcorn-scented hand cream with shea butter, brazil nut oil, and sunflower seed oil for long-lasting hydration.

articles.title: Wawa plots next Miami Valley location
articles.author: Lauren Steen
articles.summary: Wawa is considering Dayton as the next location for its regional expansion. This expansion may bring Wawa's convenience store services to a new area.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A releases this October
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.summary: Nintendo announced that Pokémon Legends: Z-A and Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition will debut on October 16th. Preorders for digital versions will begin June 5th on the Nintendo eShop, and physical editions start July 23rd. A Pokémon Presents streaming presentation focused on Legends: Z-A is scheduled for July 22nd to reveal more details about the game.

articles.title: AVEDA Launches in the U.S. Amazon Premium Beauty Store
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Aveda is launching its vegan hair, skin, body, and lifestyle products in the U.S. Amazon Premium Beauty store. This debut will make Aveda's products accessible to a wider range of consumers across the country.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A release date announced, Switch 2 edition will have "improved graphics and frame rates"
articles.author: Victoria Phillips Kennedy
articles.summary: Nintendo announced that Pokémon Legends: Z-A will launch on October 16th for Nintendo Switch and Switch 2, with pre-orders starting June 5th via the Nintendo eShop. A Nintendo Switch 2 Edition will offer improved graphics and frame rates, with upgrade packs available for both digital and physical versions. The game blends an RPG story in Lumiose City with action elements and a real-time battle system.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1, Lava Bold N1 Pro Prices Revealed Ahead of Launch Tomorrow; Check Confirmed Specifications and Features of Upcoming Lava Bold N1 Series Smartphones
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles is launching the Lava Bold N1 series smartphones in India. The Lava Bold N1 will be available starting at INR 5,999, while the Lava Bold N1 Pro will start at INR 6,699, with sale starting on June 2 and June 4, 2025 respectively. The Bold N1 Pro features a 50MP AI camera, 6.67-inch HD+ 120Hz display, and 5,000mAh battery, while the Bold N1 has 13MP dual cameras and a 6.75-inch display.

articles.title: Origin Hybrid Pro mattress review: gigantic, firm … the James Bond of mattresses
articles.author: Jane Hoskyn
articles.summary: Origin has introduced the Hybrid Pro mattress, a firm and supportive bed-in-a-box designed for individuals seeking a robust sleeping surface. The mattress was tested for firmness, comfort, sinkage, edge support, and heat retention and is available at £680 for a double.

articles.title: Snappy Unveils Enterprise API Suite to Power Growth, Retention, and Engagement Through Strategic Gifting at Every Stage of the Customer and Employee Journey
articles.author: Snappy
articles.summary: Snappy, a gifting platform, launched Snappy's API Suite on May 28, 2025. This enterprise-grade solution allows organizations to integrate customized gifting experiences directly into their websites, apps, and platforms for customers, employees, and prospects.

articles.title: Morphy Richards Expands into Central America with First Brand Experience Store
articles.author: 美通社
org: 亞博館作為世界級博覽場地，一直致力打造精彩且具特色的盛…
School of Computing and Data Science
articles.summary: Morphy Richards has launched its Central American presence with the opening of its premier brand experience store. They have also launched in Taiwan via a crowdfunding campaign. The company plans new product unveilings for IFA 2025 as part of its global expansion.

articles.title: Big Nintendo Direct conference could be imminent as Switch 2 prepares to launch
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 is potentially launching on June 5. Nintendo may hold a Direct presentation either in the week of launch, or the week after to showcase post-release games, and make new announcements. The Nintendo Switch 2 release date was announced during a recent Direct conference.

articles.title: 11 Best New Dollar Tree Arrivals for Your Money in June
articles.author: Heather Taylor
articles.summary: Dollar Tree has introduced 11 new items in June, which are considered worth buying due to their lower price compared to big-box stores or online retailers. These new arrivals include both obvious summer essentials like swim floats and less obvious ones like foot powder.

articles.title: Aldi launches bargain cleaning essential that's a dupe for Flash but £30 cheaper
articles.author: Caron Mckinlay
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Spray Mop Set, priced at £11.99, as a budget-friendly alternative to the Flash Power Spray Mop Floor Cleaner. The Aldi mop is designed to clean floors effectively, picking up 50% more dirt and dust than a regular mop.

articles.title: Stay Cool: Dettol Unveils MS Dhoni as Brand Ambassador for Icy Cool Campaign
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Dettol has launched its new Dettol Icy Cool line of soaps, bodywash, and handwash, featuring Mahendra Singh Dhoni as its brand ambassador. The Icy Cool formula provides 3x intense cooling and 99.9% protection against germs. McCann World Group created the TV commercial for the product campaign.

articles.title: The Chromebook Plus Might Be the Best Choice For Linux Newbies
articles.author: Patrick Campanale
articles.summary: Chromebooks now come with a native Linux shell that users can enable for full Linux functionality. For an optimal Linux experience, users should choose a Chromebook Plus model, which offers enhanced specifications, including a 12th Gen i3 or Ryzen 3 7000-series processor, 8GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, and a 1080p IPS display.

articles.title: ASUS's Latest NUC Tiny PC Has Up To an RTX 5070
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: ASUS has unveiled the NUC 15 Performance, a new compact PC designed for high performance gaming. This PC features an Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 mobile GPU. The NUC 15 Performance offers dual-channel DDR5 memory support, fast storage, and up-to-date connectivity.

articles.title: Vapor to Vaporless, One Click: Sikary Unveils the Cloud Zero 20000 Puffs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sikary launched its new vaping device, the Cloud Zero 20000 puffs, in Dubai, marking its entry into the Middle East market. The device features a novel 'Vaporless Mode' that eliminates visible emissions while maintaining flavor and performance. This launch underscores Sikary's dedication to localized engagement through product trials and user sharing.

articles.title: புதிய எம்பிவி & எஸ்யூவி வெளியீடுகள்.. டைம்லைனை உறுதி செய்தது நிஸான்!
articles.summary: Nissan will launch new MPV and SUV models. The company confirms this timeline for the release of these vehicles.

articles.title: You may be able to log into apps using ChatGPT
articles.summary: OpenAI is proposing a new service, "Sign in with ChatGPT," which will compete with existing identity services. This new feature could allow OpenAI to create an ecosystem around ChatGPT accounts, potentially leading to deeper AI integration in consumer apps.

articles.title: Market-Ready Clone Scripts: Your Shortcut to Success
articles.author: kakashii
articles.summary: Bizvertex introduces Market-Ready Clone Scripts, tested and designed to meet industry standards by replicating the functionality of successful apps like Uber and AirBnB. These customizable, secure, and scalable scripts allow businesses to launch quickly with proven business models, avoiding the complexities of building an app from scratch.

articles.title: LG subsidiary lighting up new Cherry Creek office
articles.author: Matt Geiger
articles.summary: LG Ad Solutions is focusing on integrating artificial intelligence to recommend more relevant ads to consumers. The company is opening a satellite office in Denver to enhance its technical and innovation capabilities. The new office will house a dedicated innovation lab to create new tech for the firm.

articles.title: New Look 'gorgeous' £23 summer dress with pockets shoppers find 'really comfy'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: New Look is offering a 25% discount on its Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, now priced at £22.99 for the red, pink, and black versions. The dress, originally £29.99, is available in five colors and features an elasticated waist, flowy midi skirt, and ruching at the bodice.

articles.title: Next shoppers are 'buying several' of £24 dress 'flattering on tummy'
articles.author: Rafi Mauro-Benady
articles.summary: Next is selling the Black Twist Short Sleeved T-Shirt Summer Dress for £24. River Island offers a similar dress for £26, and New Look has a Black Cotton Midi Smock Dress for £19.99. The Next dress, crafted from breathable cotton, has received a 4.5-star review on Next's website.

articles.title: Opera announces Opera Neon, the first AI agentic browser
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Opera has announced the launch of Opera Neon, a new AI agentic browser designed to understand user intent and perform tasks. Opera Neon features an integrated AI agent for web searching, information retrieval, and automation of routine web tasks. Early adopters can join the waitlist for this premium subscription product.

articles.title: Fingernail Cutter
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: EDJY launched a reimagined nail clipper featuring a single-blade design for clean cuts and an integrated clipping collector. Crafted in Michigan from high-hardness stainless steel, the cutter has an ergonomic design with a safety-tested blade stop. The product aims to offer a more precise and mess-free grooming experience.

articles.title: Bunzl Helps Employers with Washroom Hygiene Legislation Compliance
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: Bunzl Canada launched CleanWatch, a simplified version of WandaNEXT, to help employers comply with Ontario's Bill 190, which introduces stricter washroom hygiene standards. CleanWatch aims to improve cleanliness, safety, and employee experience while remaining cost-effective.

articles.title: Blue brilliance in Sandton City
articles.author: Print Content
articles.summary: Nivea introduced a refreshed range of body care products at an event in Sandton City on May 22. The new products focus on hydration and sustainability. Influencers, celebrities, and the media attended demonstrations and discussions with skincare experts.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 Turbo key features tipped online ahead of May 29 launch: Here's what to expect
articles.summary: Realme is preparing to launch its Neo 7 Turbo smartphone in China on May 29. The phone will feature a 7,200mAh battery with 100W fast charging, a BOE Q10 flat screen with a 144Hz refresh rate, and will run on the MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset. It will also have IP66, IP68, and IP69 dust and water resistance ratings, dual stereo speakers, and the Sky Communication System 2.0.

articles.title: Dettol welcomes ‘captain cool' MS Dhoni as brand ambassador
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Dettol has launched Dettol Icy Cool, a new product designed to provide cooling refreshment and protection from skin infection-causing germs during the summer. Mahendra Singh Dhoni has been appointed as the brand ambassador for Dettol Soaps, Bodywash and Handwash range, and features in a TV commercial promoting the new Dettol Icy Cool product.

articles.title: New Balance's 'Fantastic' Running Shoes With 'Plush, Cushioned' Support Are Now Under $65 on Amazon
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: New Balance Fresh Foam 680 v8 Running Shoe is available on Amazon with a discount of 25%, bringing the price down to $60. The shoe is a neutral training shoe designed for running and casual wear, featuring Fresh Foam EVA cushioning and a durable rubber outsole.

articles.title: I tried 5 buys to get rid of my strawberry legs this summer, one was agonising and even turned me & my bath orange
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: The article features reviews of new and existing shaving and tanning products. Venus Satin Care Shaving Gel, Veet Expert Miraculous Oil, and Estrid Pre-Shave Treatment are tested for shaving, with Estrid receiving a positive review. Superdrug, bBold and St. Moriz self-tanning products, Sally Hansen Airbrush Legs Instant Tan Spray, and Bulldog Skincare Sensitive After Shave Balm are also reviewed for their effects and application.

articles.title: Opera's new AI browser can create games, code, and reports
articles.summary: Opera Neon features an AI engine, a 'premium subscription product'. The engine can create games, reports, code snippets, and websites. The launch date and pricing are yet to be disclosed.

articles.title: TD Africa brings Black Friday deals
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: TD Africa launched the 'Black Friday Every Friday' campaign. The campaign offers significant discounts on premium products. It is a weekly promotion.

articles.title: A New Consumer Order: How China's Gen Z is Reshaping the Market-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Mingming Busy, a snack discount chain, is rapidly expanding with over 14,000 stores by the end of 2024, primarily in China's third- and fourth-tier cities. This growth is fueled by the increasing consumer power of Generation Z, who prioritize authenticity, affordability, and emotional connection, thereby challenging traditional brands.

articles.title: Opera's new AI browser promises to write code while you sleep
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Opera is introducing Opera Neon, an 'AI agentic browser' with contextual awareness that performs tasks for users, including researching, building, and designing. Neon features an AI engine capable of understanding user requests and creating content like games and websites. Opera Neon also features an AI Agent, which automates routine web tasks.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 2025 series set for North American release on 05 June
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the refreshed Motorola Edge 2025 handset in North American markets on June 5th. The phone will be available unlocked via Best Buy, Amazon, and Motorola directly, as well as through T-Mobile, Metro, Total Wireless, Visible, Spectrum, and Xfinity Mobile. The recommended price is USD 549.99.

articles.title: 'What brands get wrong about disruption'
articles.author: Polly Hopkins
articles.summary: mud, an emerging petcare company, launched with a focus on mess and natural animal instincts, offering the 'Everyday Wash for Dirty Dogs'. The beauty industry saw the introduction of The Ordinary, which democratized skincare. Glossier built its brand around user-generated content.

articles.title: Firm Expands Reach, Reaffirms Commitment To Quality
articles.author: Solomon Nda-Isaiah
articles.summary: Noinachi Digestive bread, a food production company in Nigeria, has launched a new outlet in Mabushi, Abuja. The company aims to provide quality pastries and promote healthy consumption, focusing on the nutritional benefits of wholemeal-based products. The launch event included executives emphasizing their commitment to high standards and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: These $130 Anker earbuds have no business sounding this good for the price
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: Anker's Soundcore Liberty 5 earbuds are now available on Amazon for $129. The earbuds offer robust low-end, smooth mids, and clear highs and require the Soundcore app for customization and firmware updates.

articles.title: Next shoppers rave about luxurious bed sheets that are 'soft to the touch'
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next introduces the White 400 Thread Count 100% Egyptian Cotton Sateen Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set. It is made from breathable Egyptian cotton, ranges from £50 to £82, and includes a duvet cover and pillowcase set available in sizes from single to superking. The duvet cover features button fastening and is machine washable.

articles.title: Snipes is Selling the Most Comfortable New Balance Sneakers for 40% Off
articles.author: Kenneth Brown
articles.summary: New Balance Fresh Foam X RCVRY sneakers are available on Snipes at discounted prices. The sneakers feature a massaging interior, Fresh Foam X midsole, and foot-hugging upper for optimal comfort and recovery. They are available in three colorways: 'Phantom,' 'Concrete Castlerock,' and 'Tamarind,' with prices ranging from $59 to $79.

articles.title: Jetour Nigeria reinforces brands influence, unveils new X70 SUV
articles.author: Blueprint
articles.summary: Jetour Nigeria has unveiled the newest edition of its flagship model, the Jetour X70, in Nigeria. This introduction aims to reinforce the brand's growing influence in Nigeria's competitive SUV market.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: New featherweight champion
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung officially launched the Galaxy S25 Edge globally on May 13, 2025, highlighting its slim design and flagship features. The phone features a 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 6.7-inch display. It runs on Android 15 with Samsung's One UI 7, incorporating new AI features like Multimodal AI Agents and offers configurations with 12GB RAM and up to 512GB of storage.

articles.title: Fast Simon Advances Server-Side Rendering by Integrating With Shopify Hydrogen 2
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Fast Simon announced an enhanced integration with Shopify's Hydrogen 2, bringing server-side rendering capabilities to Fast Simon's AI-driven merchandising, search, and personalization suite.  This integration delivers faster load times, stronger SEO performance, and seamless user experiences for Shopify merchants building custom storefronts. Core features of the Fast Simon and Shopify Hydrogen 2 integration were also highlighted.

articles.title: Shop with ease: Taobao launches Bahasa Malaysia interface for Malaysians
articles.author: Kenneth Tee
articles.summary: Taobao has launched a Bahasa Malaysia interface for its e-commerce site, powered by AI translation. Alongside this launch, Taobao has introduced updates including an image search feature, coins cashback, purchase incentives, and exclusive perks for first-time shoppers in Malaysia, aiming to enhance the localized shopping experience.

articles.title: N64 games get exclusive Switch 2 features to up the nostalgia
articles.author: Austin Manchester
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 in about a week. Nintendo shared that a new set of features on the Nintendo Switch 2 will separate it from the original Switch.

articles.title: Adobe launches Real-Time CDP Collaboration in Australia and New Zealand
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Adobe has launched Adobe Real-Time CDP Collaboration in Australia and New Zealand. The product enables advertisers and publishers to collaborate on first-party data in a secure environment, enhancing audience identification and campaign personalization. News Corp Australia, carsales, Nine, SBS, and TVNZ are the first publisher partners for the new Adobe's product.

articles.title: The customer experience revolution: More than just service
articles.author: Marie Francine Umulisa
articles.summary: Bank of America utilizes Erica, an AI-driven virtual assistant, to offer personalized financial advice and manage transactions. Bank of Kigali is implementing 'NANJYE NI BK' to tailor products and services to individual customer needs, enhancing transactional, lending, savings, investing and digital services. Development Bank of Singapore (DBS) is transforming branches into advisory hubs, blending digital transactions with personalized human guidance.

articles.title: Here are the best Ninja kitchen appliances for your home
articles.author: Maddy Wilson
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced several new kitchen appliances designed for convenience and efficiency. These include the Ninja FlexDrawer Air Fryer with MegaZone, the Ninja Sizzle Indoor Grill and Flat Plate, the Ninja Blast Max Cordless Portable Blender, the Ninja Foodi 11-in-1 Multi Cooker, and the Ninja Creami Ice Cream Maker. Each appliance offers unique features and functionalities aimed at simplifying cooking and food preparation.

articles.title: Here's what the new 'Copilot Mode' within Edge looks like
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Microsoft is integrating Copilot into the "new tab" page of Microsoft Edge. This new feature, part of "Copilot Mode," presents users with a Copilot prompt and suggested prompts when opening a new tab, offering an AI-powered browsing experience directly within Edge.

articles.title: Dmail Network Launches NFT Domain Marketplace for Web3 Digital Identities
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Dmail Network launched an NFT Domain Marketplace.

articles.title: YouWare Launches as the First AI Coding Platform for Creators
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: YouWare has officially launched its AI coding platform built for creators. This platform empowers individuals of all backgrounds to bring ideas to life using AI coding tools, intuitive interface, real-time previews, and a remixable community ecosystem.

articles.title: YouWare Launches as the First AI Coding Platform for Creators
articles.author: You Ware
articles.summary: YouWare launched its AI coding platform. The platform empowers creators to develop interactive experiences with AI coding.

articles.title: YouWare Launches as the First AI Coding Platform for Creators
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: YouWare launched YouWare, the first AI coding platform designed for creators. The platform enables anyone to turn AI-generated code into live, shareable websites with features like prompt-to-website generation, built-in design enhancements, and one-click remixing.

articles.title: 14 Flattering Dresses We're Grabbing at Nordstrom's Half Yearly Sale
articles.author: Jennifer Ford
articles.summary: Nordstrom is holding its Half-Yearly Sale, offering up to 60% off on items including summer dresses. The sale features dresses from brands like Naked Wardrobe, with styles ranging from minis to maxis. The sale is available until June 1.

articles.title: Moto G56 5G Surfaces on Motorola Website with Dimensity 7060 and 50MP Camera
articles.author: Sudhanshu
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto G56 5G has appeared on the brand's Czech and Slovak websites, with official launch set for May 29. The device features a 6.5-inch display, IP68/IP69 rated body, 50MP Sony Lytia 600 main sensor and MediaTek Dimensity 7060 processor.

articles.title: The original Dyson bladeless fan just got a long-awaited revamp, and it looks better than ever
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Dyson Cool CF1, a product that took 16 years to arrive, features a series of upgrades. These upgrades contribute to its continued relevance and effectiveness in the market.

articles.title: If You're Over The Age Of 25 And Don't Have These 58 Extremely Useful Products, You Should By Now
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced Poreless Putty Primer, comparable to Tatcha Silk Canvas Primer, offering a lightweight, velvety texture for flawless foundation application. Bissell launched a multipurpose portable cleaner for carpets, couches, car seats, and mattresses, effectively removing spills and grime. Whiskware released a pancake batter mixer with a BlenderBall whisk, simplifying pancake preparation and reducing dishes.

articles.title: 34 Affordable Beauty Finds
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch and features of various skincare and beauty products from different companies, including LilyAna's hydrating eye cream, Elizavecca collagen-coating hair mask, and Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream. Other products mentioned are Skin1004's zombie masks, Essence Lash Princess mascara, and Revlon face roller among others. The products are described based on their features, benefits, use case, and affordability.

articles.title: Zion Williamson's FUTURE with Pelicans: Trade Rumors, Salary Cap Issues, Draft Options
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers streaming content via its dedicated application, the WeAreIowa app. Users can access the streaming service on their phones by downloading and using this app.

articles.title: Google's AI-powered advertising innovations to propel business growth in Nigeria
articles.author: Juliet Umeh
articles.summary: Google introduced a suite of AI-powered innovations at Google Marketing Live (GML) 2025, designed to enhance online presence and growth strategies for Nigerian businesses. The innovations include 'Ads in AI Overviews' that boost Google usage and create advertiser opportunities, 'AI Marketing Assistants' for streamlined operations, and 'Enhanced Visual Content Creation with Generative AI' like AI Outpainting, which expands videos beyond their original frames and will be available in more campaign types later this year.

articles.title: 45 Products With Unbelievable Results
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products, including Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Cosrx snail mucin essence, The Pink Stuff's new sponge set, Rain-X Original Windshield Treatment, Finishing Touch electric razor, and Burt's Bees dander-reducing spray. It also mentions a portable Bissell Little Green machine and a Nuvo cabinet paint kit. These products span skincare, cleaning, automotive, pet care, and home improvement categories, each designed to offer unique solutions and benefits to consumers.

articles.title: Samsung unveils most advanced TVs and soundbars powered by Vision AI
articles.author: Samsung Electronics Singapore
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore has launched its 2025 lineup of AI-powered TVs and soundbars, including the Neo QLED 8K QN990F, Neo QLED 4K QN90F, OLED S95F, and The Frame Pro models, all featuring Samsung Vision AI for personalized experiences. The company also introduced the HW-Q990F and HW-QS700F soundbars with AI-driven sound optimization. Customers pre-ordering the new TVs can get free gifts worth up to S$1,448.

articles.title: China's BYD gains ground in Sri Lanka's auto market
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: BYD, in partnership with John Keells CG Auto, is introducing its premium luxury brand DENZA to Sri Lanka, featuring models like the D9, N7, Z9, and Z9GT. This launch is supported by expanding showroom and after-sales networks in key locations across the country. The companies also plan to establish a regional training center to build technical capabilities.

articles.title: Watch someone unbox the Switch 2 a week before the release date
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 will officially launch on Thursday, June 5th. A YouTuber shared an unboxing video of the Switch 2 in its official retail packaging.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch Online Adds New N64 Features for Switch 2 Subscribers
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 is launching next week and will introduce new features for Nintendo Switch Online, including GameCube titles exclusive to the new console. Nintendo is also adding other features for next-gen subscribers.

articles.title: Villeneuve family launches brand, clothing collection for late father Gilles
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: The family of the late Gilles Villeneuve launched a new collection. This new collection celebrates the legendary driver's enduring legacy.

articles.title: ZHITAI, YMTC's Retail Storage Brand, Set for COMPUTEX Taipei 2025 Debut
articles.author: Antara News
articles.summary: YMTC offers a product line that features SSDs, portable SSDs, and memory cards. This product line comprehensively meets users' daily storage needs, catering to both consumer and enterprise markets.

articles.title: China's BYD gains ground in Sri Lanka's auto market
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: BYD plans to introduce its premium luxury brand, DENZA, in Sri Lanka. This introduction will be facilitated through BYD's local distributor, John Keells CG Auto. The announcement was made at a press conference.

articles.title: Sweet Sips: a local twist on dirty soda and community fun
articles.author: Raegan Edelman
articles.summary: Sweet Sips, founded by Lexi and Jake Gunter, offers creative dirty sodas at local farmers markets. They are expanding their business by offering catering services for events like weddings and parties, aiming to reach a wider audience. The expansion into catering is a significant growth area for the company.

articles.title: The Dirty Martini Has Entered The Breakfast Game
articles.author: Aly Walansky
articles.summary: PopUp Bagels launched a limited-edition Dirty Martini Schmear on May 29, available through June 4. This new flavor is a collaboration with Mezzetta and ALB Vodka, incorporating briny olives and vodka into a bagel spread.

articles.title: AI Browser Unleashes Powerful Coding Capabilities in Opera Neon
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Opera introduced Opera Neon, a new AI browser designed to enhance browsing efficiency. This launch reflects Opera's commitment to pushing browser boundaries and introducing innovative tools for digital asset users and technology enthusiasts.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A finally receives release date, with a new Pokémon Presents revealed
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 will officially release Pokémon Legends: Z-A on Oct. 16, 2025. The Pokémon Company International announced that the game will be available on the Switch with an upgrade path to the Switch 2 edition. Digital pre-orders for Pokémon are now open.

articles.title: Ninja 10-in-1 cooker that's a 'game changer in the kitchen' slashed from �230 to �120
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of a versatile cooker by £110.

articles.title: Rawabi Hypermarket launches ‘Win One Million' campaign
articles.author: Qatar Tribune
articles.summary: Satyendra PathakDohaRawabi Hypermarket has launched Rawabi Hypermarket.

articles.title: Users Claim This Portable Steamer Is Much Quicker Than Ironing — And It's Less Than $40
articles.author: Huffington Post
articles.summary: An affordable steamer offers a dual function as a lint remover. This product combines steaming and lint removal capabilities.

articles.title: Farm Rich debuts frozen breakfast line
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company has introduced a product line of five new frozen items packed with protein.

articles.title: ‘Pokémon Legends: Z-A' will release this October
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Nintendo confirmed that Pokémon Legends: Z-A will launch on October 16, 2026. This announcement refines the previously vague 2025 release window for the game.

articles.title: Switch 2 will bring new features to NSO's Nintendo 64 catalogue, including the ability to ...
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo is releasing the Switch 2 next week. The new console will feature changes to N64 classics.

articles.title: Pok�mon Legends: Z-A: How to preorder and get free gifts? See release date, platforms, setting, ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: The Pokmon Company announced the release of Pokmon Legends: Z-A on October 16, 2025, with preorders starting June 5. A new Pokmon Presents video is scheduled for July 22. Special pre-order gifts and new Mega Evolution merchandise have also been launched.

articles.title: Opera's new AI browser promises to write code while you sleep
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Opera is launching Opera Neon, a new 'agentic browser' featuring AI agents. These agents perform tasks on the user's behalf, such as researching, building, and designing.

articles.title: Bunzl Helps Employers with Washroom Hygiene Legislation Compliance
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: CleanWatch™ launched its exclusive platform in anticipation of Ontario's Bill 190 deadline on July 1, 2025. This launch introduces a new product related to compliance with the upcoming legislation.

articles.title: Nissan's India plans intact with new products coming, reiterates MD
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Magnite introduces a new CNG kit option for its 1.0-litre manual transmission model. The kit is priced at ₹75,000.

articles.title: What is the release date for Pokemon Legends: Z-A?
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A has a release date. This indicates the upcoming launch of the video game.

articles.title: Pokemon Presents Announced for July 22nd
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo announced a new Pokemon Presents for July 22nd. The presentation will offer more information on the new game Pokemon Legends: Z-A.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Launches on October 16th
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo announced the launch of Pokemon Legends: Z-A, the next mainline title in the series, on October 16th. The game will be available on Nintendo Switch and the upcoming Switch 2, offering improved visuals and frame rates on the latter.

articles.title: Opera rethinks the role of the browser with Neon, the first AI agentic web browser ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Opera has introduced Opera Neon, a new AI-powered browser. This browser is capable of performing tasks for users, even when they are offline. Opera Neon is a fully agentic AI browser.

articles.title: Opera Neon's AI Agents Can Fetch Information and Build Websites for You
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Opera unveiled Opera Neon, an AI agent-powered browser. The Norwegian tech company developed this browser to enhance the user experience.

articles.title: BASF Egypt launches commercial operations of Nunhems vegetable seed varieties
articles.author: Daily News Egypt
articles.summary: BASF Agricultural Solutions Egypt has launched commercial operations for its vegetable seed brand, BASF | Nunhems, in Egypt. This launch signifies BASF's expansion and dedication to vegetable production in the Egyptian market. The event occurred at the Pyramids of Giza.

articles.title: Opera Neon browser launches with built-in AI and a monthly fee
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Opera is relaunching Opera Neon, a browser concept, integrating agentic AI. This AI assistant allows users to assign tasks which the browser will execute autonomously. Opera integrates local AI for user interaction.

articles.title: HyFun Foods launches ‘Mumbai Aloo Vada' for HoReCa segment
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: A company will introduce the 'Spice Paneer Patty'. This represents a new product being launched by the company.

articles.title: Bona® Launches Space-Saving Spray Mop Air for Modern Homes
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: Bona introduced a new lightweight Spray Mop. This new product combines modern convenience with cleaning performance.

articles.title: Computex 2025: AI meets adrenaline
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Taiwan's tech giants are showcasing next-generation products. These products are focused on artificial intelligence (AI) and innovation.
